TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create and update an Accident Event and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates an Accident Event.The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.The Producer updates the Accident Event.The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Event message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Accident is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (1) creates an Accident Event with name XXX_ACCIDENT_5907 with the following information: * EventClassification=Environmental * DescriptionText (some text) * StaffComment (some text)
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Event: ITA_ ACCIDENT_5907
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the Accident correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (1) updates the Accident with the following information: * EventClassification=Disastrous * DescriptionText (some updated text) * StaffComment (some updated text)
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the Accident correctly.
